tool_description: Analyzes delivery time patterns and trends, identifying factors that impact shipping speed and consistency.

shipment_data_id.description: Reference ID for previously retrieved shipping data

error_messages: Invalid shipment data ID: The provided data reference cannot be found or has expired.
Invalid time granularity: Use daily, weekly, or monthly.
Insufficient time range data: Need at least 7 days of data for meaningful analysis.
Service level not found: One or more specified service levels are not present in the data.
usage: Provide shipment_data_id and optionally specify time_granularity and service_levels to focus the analysis on specific delivery patterns.

average_delivery_days.description: Overall average delivery time in days

delivery_trends.description: Identified trends in delivery performance over time

peak_delay_periods.description: Time periods with highest delivery delays
